Title: TYPO3 Cross-Site Scripting in Form Framework
Description: Failing to properly encode user input, frontend forms handled by the form framework (system extension “form”) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 8.5.0 before 8.7.23, all versions starting from 9.0.0 before 9.5.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 8.5.0, all versions starting from 8.7.23 before 9.0.0, all versions starting from 9.5.4
